name: Cake (ZebraAtomica)
description:
♥  14/09/2020 ♥  

 Made a "game" for my girlfriend's birthday and also, our 2 years together in 3 days with a little help from my best Monkeys: GravityI and CaptainDaws.

It's just a walking simulator. Play it if u wanna see assets and a really really really short and cheesy story.
